meanings.sent1: She was unashamed of her actions.
meanings.sent2: He walked unashamedly down the street, proud of his achievements.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the vase unashamedly, then looked at us innocently.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed unashamedly through the quiet library.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the painting stood unashamedly vibrant against the dull walls.

meanings.sent1: The toddler danced unashamed in front of the crowd.
meanings.sent2: She spoke unashamedly about her love for sci-fi movies.
meanings.sent3: The dog barked unashamedly at the vacuum cleaner, thinking it was a threat.
meanings.sent4: The sun rose unashamedly, spreading its warm light across the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed unashamedly, showing off their vibrant colors to all who passed by.
